name: Score Stars-Basketball Games3D
description:
Real Basketball Arcade Machine game !Swipe up, aim at the basket, throw basketball, hit the basket！
Super addictive, entertaining sports game with super physics, graphics!

Enjoy your free time by playing Basketball Arcade Game with super attractive gameplay!

Main Features:

-Easy to play
- Exiting Graphics, sounds!
- Astonishing physics!
- Interesting and challenging Gameplay!

Get it now and you’ll never feel bored.
